_upm.changelog:
Added
- Added error callback support (with explicit cancellation).

Changed
- Synced the RtMidi C wrapper with upstream.
- Added MidiBase abstract base class to share the base functionality between MidiIn and MidiOut.
- Refactored the managed callback bridge for IL2CPP.
- Refreshed native plugin binaries/import settings for Unity 2022.3 across all supported platforms; improved build scripts including Emscripten detection for Web.
- Migrated the package release workflow for the signed package process.

Fixed
- Avoided recursion in CompiledApiByName P/Invoke and tightened error handling paths when releasing callbacks.
- Fixed Linux test startup issues caused by virtual MIDI ports being enumerated as usable devices.
